title: Strengthening Learning Design Practical Competencies: Human-Centered Language Education Design Using Design Thinking

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Literacy and General Understanding of Language Learning
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can design language learning scenarios using the 5-stage design thinking process (Empathize-Define-Ideate-Prototype-Test)
Learners can observe field-based language challenges using smartphones and visualize them through empathy maps
Learners can develop peer feedback-driven language learning prototypes using digital collaboration tools

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
